content: i designed this hat for running it is thin light and washable and doesn t have holes in it it weighs an ounce and can be carried in a small pocket since i don t care for hats that cover my ears it is short many thanks to my wife sharon sharonf 1 on ravelry who knit it for me she suggested using judy s magic caston to start which doesn t leave a hole or bump sharon also translated my handwritten pattern into the neatly organized document available here and added clarifications to the second edition of the pattern 1 http //www ravelry com/designers/sharon-fuller
